attributes.action: Have a nuanced approach to quarantine for the Spanish islands.
attributes.additional_details: it is unfair and unjust on the Uk people who have saved hard & waited through lockdown for their holiday. They will lose money with the cancellations & tourist industry jobs will be lost.
attributes.background: Instead of a blanket Fco advice against essential travel. Look at the Spanish island cv19 infection rate and base the decision on that. The Canaries has had 1 case!  It is safer than the Uk!
